detail_desc: Sleeveless dress in soft organic cotton jersey with decorative bows at the shoulders, a gathered seam at the waist and gently flared skirt.

Hat in soft, jacquard-knit cotton in the shape of a strawberry with a tiny stalk at the top.
Cotton twill fisherman’s hats, one with an all-over print. Lined. Width of brim approx 4.5 cm.
Sleeveless top in airy chiffon with a double-layered front with decorative studs, raw edges around the neckline and armholes and slits in the sides. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Short dress in a crêpe weave with a collar and buttons down the front. Gently dropped shoulders, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs, and slits in the sides. Unlined.
Short, straight-cut dress in a crêpe weave with an opening and button at the back of the neck and 3/4-length sleeves with a flounce at the cuffs. Unlined.

Calf-length dress in a patterned jacquard weave with a slight sheen. Pleats that taper at the waist, a concealed zip at the back, dropped shoulders and long balloon sleeves with narrow, close-fitting, buttoned cuffs. Unlined.
Short cycling shorts in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Knee-length dress in a crêpe weave with a stand-up collar and concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist with a sewn-on tie belt and an asymmetric skirt with a frill down the front. Unlined.

Top in soft viscose jersey with a unique nursing feature, round neck and short puff sleeves trimmed with a sewn-on bow. The design includes a double layer at the top to help retain warmth while allowing easier nursing access.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with dolman sleeves. Rounded and slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved, off-the-shoulder jersey top with a double frill in woven fabric and narrow elastication at the top.

Joggers in soft, stretch cotton twill with an elasticated drawstring waist, fake front pockets, a fake fly and elasticated hems.
Metal bangle.
Sleeveless dress in a jacquard weave containing glittery threads with a concealed zip at the back. Seam at the waist and a very wide skirt with a tulle underskirt. Lined.

Corset top in imitation leather with a slightly worn finish, a zip down the front, one fake zipped pocket at the front and one fake pocket with a press-stud. Inset section in stretch jersey at the back.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Trousers in an airy viscose weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and tapered legs with elasticated hems.
Top and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top in slub jersey with a chest pocket and rounded hem. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.
Top and leggings in soft cotton jersey. Short-sleeved top in slub jersey with a chest pocket and rounded hem. Patterned leggings with an elasticated waist.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, textured jersey with straps that have decorative knots at the front and cross at the back and can be adjusted with buttons. Elastication at the back of the waist, concealed press-studs at the crotch (not in sizes 1-2Y) and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist. Print-motifs on the knees, sewn-in appliqués down the legs and ribbed hems. Soft brushed inside.
Boxer shorts in a cotton weave with an elasticated waist, long legs and button fly.
5-pocket trousers in stretch cotton corduroy with a regular waist, zip fly and button, and skinny legs.
Sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric with an elasticated waist and ventilating mesh sections on the legs.
Set with a T-shirt and shorts. T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif. Knee-length, 5-pocket shorts in washed stretch twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and a zip fly and press-stud.

Wide, high-waisted trousers in woven fabric with pleats at the top, a concealed hook-and-eye fastener and zip fly. Side pockets, fake welt back pockets and wide legs.

Backless jersey top with small round studs and ties at the neck and hem.
High-waisted, slim-fit trousers in stretch twill with lacing at the back of the waistband and a concealed zip in one side.
Slim-fit jeans in superstretch, flexible denim for maximum movement. Adjustable elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
